mobileResponsivenessTip: Consider improving touch target sizes and adjusting font sizes for better readability on small screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and implement lazy loading to improve page loading speed.
seoOptimizationTip: Enhance meta descriptions and improve heading structure for better content indexing.
userExperienceTip: Simplify navigation and make key information (like pricing and availability) more accessible.
bookingFlowTip: Make the booking process more streamlined by reducing the number of steps and providing more visual cues.
tips: Consider improving accessibility features such as alternative text for images and keyboard navigation support.
whatThisWebsiteDoesInOneLine: We found that your website promotes and facilitates bookings for LEGOLAND® New York Hotel.
